QuestData.Title: All Hell Breaks Loose
QuestData.Description: Worgen! My father had warned me that Archmage Arugal's creations had run amok.$B$BBut where are they coming from?$B$BI suppose it doesn't matter. Help us make quick work of them. We'll show them what we Gilneans are made of!
QuestData.LogDescription: Prince Liam Greymane wants you to slay 6 Rampaging Worgen.
QuestData.RewardText: It's no use, $n! They're not letting up.
